summary: This document is an email from Amanda Kirby to Lisa D regarding the status of funds related to Southern Trust and Southern Financial. It mentions a potential inquiry from JPMorgan for missing information.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is an associate at Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, reaching out to Lisa D about financial matters.

persons.name: Lisa D
persons.context: Lisa D is the recipient of the email from Amanda Kirby, involved in discussions about financial transactions.

locations: 345 Park Avenue, 27th Fl, New York, NY, USA

The email references a potential inquiry from JPMorgan regarding missing information.
